Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)]
Le annotazioni sono `strings` definite che contengono informazioni associate ad alcuni tipi di dati di rilevamento. Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowDataTrackingExtract.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackPoint.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.WorkflowTrackingRecord.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>, o <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.TrackingDataItem.Annotations%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
